name: QuizLand
0:
”Alexa, open fun quiz”
”Alexa, start fun quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun quiz
des: Play an interesting game of quiz with Alexa. While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
